table.name: civicrm_pcp_block
table.comment: A Personal Campaign Page Block stores admin configurable status options and rules

field.name: target_entity_type
field.title: Target Entity
field.comment: The type of entity that this pcp targets

field.name: target_entity_id
field.title: Target Entity ID
field.comment: The entity that this pcp targets

field.name: supporter_profile_id
field.title: Supporter Profile
field.comment: FK to civicrm_uf_group.id. Does Personal Campaign Page require manual activation by administrator? (is inactive by default after setup)?

field.name: owner_notify_id
field.title: Owner Notification
field.comment: FK to civicrm_option_group with name = PCP owner notifications

field.name: is_approval_needed
field.title: Approval Required?
field.comment: Does Personal Campaign Page require manual activation by administrator? (is inactive by default after setup)?

field.name: is_tellfriend_enabled
field.title: Tell a Friend Enabled?
field.comment: Does Personal Campaign Page allow using tell a friend?

field.name: tellfriend_limit
field.title: Tell A Friend Limit
field.comment: Maximum recipient fields allowed in tell a friend

field.name: is_active
field.title: Enabled?
field.comment: Is Personal Campaign Page Block enabled/active?

field.name: notify_email
field.title: Notification Email
field.comment: If set, notification is automatically emailed to this email-address on create/update Personal Campaign Page
